title: Is there any way to see the history on Quora that I clicked earlier? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: As far as any Quora feature is concerned, not in general. (Some things you do might leave tracks under Activity or Edits in your profile.) However, if you are using a web browser, your browser does have a History feature that will allow you to return to webpages you have previously visited.

Go to your profile by clicking on your avatar. On your profile page, click ‘More’ and select ‘Activity’.  This won’t show you everything you looked at but it will show posts you’ve upvoted, as well as your answers, comments and edits. It won’t show a history of posts you’ve downvoted.
